dryrun.title: dryrun
dryrun.description: Don't run the actual simulations, just print the tasks

write_checkpoint.title: write_checkpoint
write_checkpoint.description: Write checkpoints to continue a KIMMDY run from. Default True

cwd.title: cwd
cwd.description: Working directory. Default is current working directory

name.title: name
name.description: Used for output folder if `out` is not specified

file.description: Logfile name (will result in a path relative to `out`)

max_tasks.title: max_tasks
max_tasks.description: Maximum number of tasks to run. This is useful when a task in the sequence can dymanically add more tasks. 0 means no limit.

max_hours.title: max_hours
max_hours.description: Stop KIMMDY after max_hours hours. Set this lower than the limit of your HPC cluster for use with a re-submit jobscript. 0 Means no limit.

kmc.title: kmc
kmc.description: KMC algorithm overwrite. Should be set by the reactions, but can be changed here.

tau_scale.title: tau_scale
tau_scale.description: Scaling parameter for tau in the extrande kmc algorithm.

topology.title: topology
topology.description: Settings for handling the topology file.

reactive.title: reactive
reactive.description: Specify what moleculetypes will be part of the Reactive moleculetype. By default, solvent and ions are excluded.

include.description: Explicitly include a moleculetype or list of moleculetypes as a space-separated string.

exclude.description: Explicitly exclude a moleculetype or a list as a space-separated string. For example the lipid moleculetype in a bilayer simulation e.g. `DPPC POPC'`

gmx_mdrun_flags.title: gmx_mdrun_flags
gmx_mdrun_flags.description: Flags passed to gmx mdrun. Default `-maxh 24 -dlb yes`

ff.title: ff
ff.description: Force field directory (looks for .ff in cwd if not set)

tpr.title: tpr
tpr.description: .tpr file of a finished simulation for starting directly with a reaction

trr.title: trr
trr.description: .trr file of a finished simulation for starting directly with a reaction

mds.title: mds
mds.description: Settings for MD steps, e.g. mdp files, plumed files, etc.

mdp.description: MDP file for the MD step

use_plumed.description: Whether plumed should be used for this run or not

changer.title: changer
changer.description: Settings for applying a reaction recipe

coordinates.title: coordinates
coordinates.description: Settings related to coordinate/geometry changes when applying a recipe

md.description: MD step from the 'mds' section that is used for relaxation MDs

slow_growth.description: Whether the chosen MD step is a slow growth/free-energy simulation

topology.title: topology
topology.description: Settings for parameter changes in the topology file

parameterization.description: Parameterization scheme that is used on the topology file after changes to it

sequence.title: sequence
sequence.description: List of tasks. Each task can be a string (the name of the task) or an object with the task name and a multiplicity `mult: <int>`

plot_rates.title: plot_rates
plot_rates.description: Plot the reaction rates during the reactions step

save_recipes.title: save_recipes
save_recipes.description: Save recipes as csv during the reactions step
